mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartNum, pnum, idx, oqty, indate) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{pnum}, #{idx}, #{oqty}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(pnum) from cart where idx=#{idx} and pnum=#{pnum}
mapper.update: update cart set oqty = oqty + #{oqty} where idx=#{idx} and pnum=#{pnum}
mapper.select: select * from cartView where idx=#{idx} order by cartNum desc

select cartNum, c.pnum, p.pname, p.pimage1, p.price, p.saleprice, c.oqty, p.point, (saleprice * oqty) totalPrice, (point * oqty) totalPoint from cart c join product p on c.pnum = p.pnum where idx=#{idx} order by cartNum desc
select sum(totalPrice) cartTotalPrice, sum(totalPoint) cartTotalPoint from cartView where idx=#{idx}
select sum(saleprice * oqty) cartTotalPrice, sum(point * oqty) cartTotalPoint from cart c join product p on c.pnum = p.pnum where idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update cart set oqty=#{oqty} where cartNum=#{cartNum}
